UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Identification of an Antimicrobial Peptide from the Venom of the Trinidad Thick-Tailed Scorpion Tityus trinitatis with Potent Activity against ESKAPE Pathogens and Clostridioides difficile.
Literature.Author: Mechkarska M, Cunning TS, Taggart MG, Ternan NG, Leprince J, Coquet L, Jouenne T, Tena-Garcés J, Calvete JJ

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Pseudomonas aeruginosa DSM 50071(MIC=>400µg/ml),Escherichia coli DSM 787(MIC=100µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC BAA-1705(MIC=>100µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii DSM 30008(MIC=50µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=25µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis DSM 28319(MIC=25µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis MF 06036(MIC=50µg/ml),Enterococcus faecium NCTC 12201(MIC=25µg/ml),Clostridioides difficile DSM 27147(MIC=25µg/ml),Clostridioides difficile ATCC BAA-1382(MIC=25µg/ml)
